name: House Party - Business and Pleasure Style Pack
summary:
This DLC includes several new clothing and hairstyle customization options for the House Party characters.

All of these items can be customized like other House Party clothing items. Mix and match these new items and existing items to create incredible character designs! The transformation options are endless!

Select each item's primary and secondary colors and metallic properties. Then choose one of the over 100 patterns and customize the pattern's color, size, rotation, embossing, glow, and metallic properties. Add a decal to make it even more your own and then share it with the House Party community with our new design sharing feature!
